verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not, <S%H408>neither<s%> be you <S%H2865>dismayed:<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> with you, and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> up to <S%H5857>Ai:<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and his <S%H5892>city,<s%> and his <S%H776>land:<s%>

And you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai<s%> and her <S%H4428>king<s%> as you <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and her <S%H4428>king:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> thereof, and the <S%H929>cattle<s%> thereof, shall you take for a <S%H962>prey<s%> to yourselves: <S%H7760>lay<s%> you an <S%H693>ambush<s%> for the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> it.

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> to <S%H5927>go<s%> up against <S%H5857>Ai:<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H977>chose<s%> out <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them away by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

And he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7200>Behold,<s%> you shall <S%H693>lie<s%> in <S%H693>wait<s%> against the <S%H5892>city,<s%> even <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H5892>city:<s%> <S%H7368>go<s%> not <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from the <S%H5892>city,<s%> but be you <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3559>ready:<s%>

And I, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are with me, will <S%H7126>approach<s%> to the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, <S%H3588>when<s%> they <S%H3318>come<s%> out <S%H7125>against<s%> us, as at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> that we will <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them,

(For they will <S%H3318>come<s%> out <S%H310>after<s%> us) <S%H5704>till<s%> we have <S%H5423>drawn<s%> them from the <S%H5892>city;<s%> for they will <S%H559>say,<s%> They <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us, as at the <S%H7223>first:<s%> therefore we will <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

Then you shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> up from the <S%H693>ambush,<s%> and <S%H3423>seize<s%> on the <S%H5892>city:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And it shall be, when you have <S%H8610>taken<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> that you shall <S%H3341>set<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire:<s%> according to the <S%H1697>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall you <S%H6213>do.<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> therefore <S%H7971>sent<s%> them forth: and they <S%H3212>went<s%> to lie in <S%H693>ambush,<s%> and <S%H3427>stayed<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> side of <S%H5857>Ai:<s%> but <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3885>lodged<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up, he and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> that were with him, <S%H5927>went<s%> up, and drew <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> side of <S%H5857>Ai:<s%> now there was a <S%H1516>valley<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> them and <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> about <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and <S%H7760>set<s%> them to lie in <S%H693>ambush<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> side of the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And when they had <S%H7760>set<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%> that was on the <S%H6828>north<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and their liers in <S%H6119>wait<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%> into the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, that they <S%H4116>hurried<s%> and <S%H7925>rose<s%> up <S%H7925>early,<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> he and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> at a time <S%H4150>appointed,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6160>plain;<s%> but he <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that there were liers in <S%H693>ambush<s%> against him <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> made as if they were <S%H5060>beaten<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H5127>fled<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were in <S%H5892>Ai<s%> were <S%H2199>called<s%> together to <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them: and they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and were <S%H5423>drawn<s%> away from the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And there was not a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H5857>Ai<s%> or <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> that <S%H3318>went<s%> not out <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and they <S%H5800>left<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H6605>open,<s%> and <S%H7291>pursued<s%> after <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H5186>Stretch<s%> out the <S%H3591>spear<s%> that is in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H5857>Ai;<s%> for I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%> And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out the <S%H3591>spear<s%> that he had in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And the <S%H693>ambush<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> out of their <S%H4725>place,<s%> and they <S%H7323>ran<s%> as soon as he had <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and they <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H3920>took<s%> it, and <S%H4116>hurried<s%> and set the <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And when the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> them, they <S%H7200>saw,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5927>ascended<s%> up to <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and they had <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3027>power<s%> to <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H2007>this<s%> <S%H2008>way<s%> or that <S%H2008>way:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H2015>back<s%> on the <S%H7291>pursuers.<s%>

And when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H693>ambush<s%> had <S%H3920>taken<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and that the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5927>ascended,<s%> then they <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

And the <S%H428>other<s%> <S%H3318>issued<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> them; so they were in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H428>some<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> side, and <S%H428>some<s%> on that side: and they <S%H5221>smote<s%> them, <S%H5704>so<s%> that they let <S%H1115>none<s%> of them <S%H8300>remain<s%> or <S%H6412>escape.<s%>
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> they <S%H8610>took<s%> <S%H2416>alive,<s%> and <S%H7126>brought<s%> him to <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H2026>slaying<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> they <S%H7291>chased<s%> them, and when they were <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they were <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> it with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And so it was, that <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H5307>fell<s%> that <S%H3117>day,<s%> both of <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> were <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

For <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7725>drew<s%> not his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out the <S%H3591>spear,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he had utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai.<s%>

<S%H7535>Only<s%> the <S%H929>cattle<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of that <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took for a <S%H962>prey<s%> to <S%H1992>themselves,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua.<s%>
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H8313>burnt<s%> <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> and <S%H7760>made<s%> it an <S%H8510>heap<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> even a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5857>Ai<s%> he <S%H8518>hanged<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> a <S%H6086>tree<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6256>eventide:<s%> <S%H6153><s%> and as soon as the <S%H8121>sun<s%> was <S%H935>down,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> that they should <S%H3381>take<s%> his <S%H5038>carcass<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> it <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H6965>raise<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1530>heap<s%> of <S%H68>stones,<s%> that remains to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal,<s%>

As <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H8003>whole<s%> <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> man has <S%H5130>lift<s%> up any <S%H1270>iron:<s%> and they <S%H5927>offered<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offerings to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings.

And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> on the <S%H68>stones<s%> a <S%H4932>copy<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and their <S%H2205>elders,<s%> and <S%H7860>officers,<s%> and their <S%H8199>judges,<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> side the <S%H727>ark<s%> and on that side <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> which <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as well the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> as he that was <S%H249>born<s%> among them; <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H4136><s%> <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal;<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H7223>before,<s%> that they should <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H8451>law,<s%> the <S%H1293>blessings<s%> and <S%H7045>cursings,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law.<s%>

There was not a <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>read<s%> not <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> with the <S%H802>women,<s%> and the <S%H2945>little<s%> ones, and the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that were <S%H1980>conversant<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> them.
